body.name: Gourmia 2-in-1 Single Serve Pod + 12-Cup Coffee Maker with Adjustable Up To 4-Hour Keep Warm
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 19 mins
features: Brews 2-12 cups in CARAFE mode and 6-14 oz in POD mode
Includes reusable filter, removable funnel, and 12-Cup glass carafe
CARAFE and POD modes built into unit, so there’s no need for special attachments when switching between modes
body.description: This 2-in-1 combo brews 12 cups or a pod of coffee—without the hassle of switching, storing, or misplacing adapters. Just press the CARAFE or POD button, and the machine will open to reveal the filter or pod holder. The intuitive interface will automatically display the various brew sizes available for the selected mode, so you can brew what you need in a breeze. Brew into the 12-cup carafe provided, or into your favorite mug or travel tumbler. Enjoy the coffee that suits your taste—without giving up precious countertop space! 2-in-1 combo coffee maker brews single serve pods and coffee grounds in one unit Adapter-free machine is designed to accommodate K-Cups® and coffee grounds without the need to fiddle with separate attachments for each Brew size options in CARAFE mode: 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, or 12 cups Brew size options in POD mode: 6, 8, 10, 12, or 14 oz. Programmable Brew Later allows you to set the machine in advance so it brews coffee at your specified time Brew Strength Control gives you the option to enjoy your coffee extra strong Adjustable 4-Hour Keep ensures your coffee is hot up to 4 hours after brewing Pause & Serve feature enables you to remove the carafe during brewing, to enjoy a quick cup before the rest is ready Features large, easy-to-use intuitive display to seamlessly set and monitor brewing process Water reservoir is transparent so you can monitor water levels at a glance Fold-away shelf lowers to hold mugs and lifts to accommodate tumblers for coffee on-the-go Removable water reservoir makes it easy to refill water wherever it’s most convenient Includes reusable filter, removable funnel, and a 12-cup stainless steel thermal carafe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A better solution for cold press coffee than using a French Press
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE:Seeing a different version of this type of cold brew coffee maker on the Today's Deals page reminded me that I hadn't come back to do the promised update.This product has been in constant use since I bought it. If the dishwasher is about to run anyway, I'll put it in, but otherwise a quick rinse-out is good enough.- It fits easily in the refrigerator door;- Looks nice on the table;- Doesn't slip in the hands, even when wet, and in fact the lack of a handle makes it easier to deal with (and much less likely to get broken);- It's been banged around quite a bit, with no breakage;- I'm using about 2/3 the amount of coffee I used to with a French Press, and get a better result;- The silicone seal is not worn or stressed in any way despite being in constant use.I haven't even looked at our other coffee makers since buying this. It fits the bill perfectly. Absolutely recommend.______Original review:Easy to use, easy to clean, makes better cold brew than our French Press, and table-worthy style. Very glad we purchased this.I do wonder if the silicone seal will wear out at some point due to being switched between the filter insert and the stopper, but there doesn't seem to be any weak point for it to tear so hopefully that won't be a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke with first brewing
reviews.reviewText: There is a spring stopper that is supposed to allow you to remove the pot while brewing. That broke on the first run. We replaced the broken washer and on the second run, it wouldn't work properly, with coffee overflowing on the countertop and floor. The grounds aborb quite a bit the water so you will not get 12 cups of coffee. I can't seem to get more than 8 cups.Our house is under remodel and our contractor threw the box away, otherwise, I'd return this product and purchase something different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Lovely product with a sleek, modern appearance. It's very easy to use and the coffee that it produces is rich and robust. Despite the instructions saying to fill the chamber with coarsely ground beans, I used preground coffee because it was all I had on hand. I guessed on how much to use. I did not fill the chamber as suggested for the beans. I used twice what I normally would use for a liter of coffee and it came out yummy. the flavor is noticeably different and that says something considering I used the preground coffee. It rinsed out and cleaned up easily. Plus I got two good, tall ice coffees (no ice added, put into insulated, lidded glass) out of one application. This is my new coffee friend, for sure. I can't wait to try it with the coarsely ground beans. I'm sure it's even better. If I were to criticize anything, it would be the need for directions. None were included with my purchases. I had only what was printed on the box to guide me. I'm the type of person who needs more precision. To say "fill the chamber" tells me little. I'd like to see specific amounts for both coarsely groung AND preground. Not everyone likes the extra step of grinding beans. Overall, it's terrific!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent coffee maker a little slo to brew

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for: Coffee, Tea, Flavored Infused Waters
reviews.reviewText: Great for HOT and COLD liquids.By HOT I mean Water at boiling Tempetrues.Good size and can be used to flavor water.Provided nothing is in the inserted strainer you can pour easily without removing it.Being glass makes it much better than plastic containers.The strainer is quality stainless steel.I couldn't be happier with purchase.I highly recommend.I kept this review brief as much has already been said about product. I wanted to hit on key points absent from other reviews or appeared to be most asked.DIGITAL SIGNATUREI like to close my reviews with a THANK YOU because I do appreciate you investing precious time in reading my material. We live in a complex complicated world where time is at a premium. I do hope/pray you found this review like my others informative and helpful in aiding your next purchasing decision. Your comments are always welcome and I make every attempt to reply to comments as time permits. Again THANK YOU for the opportunity to aid you in spending your hard earned money wisely.I am not employed or receive any compensation by the manufacture or any organization promoting this product or additional hardware. I purchased or received as a gift my product like anyone else and just sharing my myriad thoughts and experience with you.I hereby extend to you a plethora of blessing of good health and welling being. Bless you all.2018 Copyrighted by Gary Drury

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought i loved this machine until it started doing things to make me hate it. 1, the grinder doesn't grind all the beans. 2, coffee grounds are in every cup of coffee which is annoying. 3, the pause and pour only worked once the rest of the time coffee would still be pouring out. I really wanted to love this thing, but it fell really short so I am returning.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No heat on burner plate when on keep warm
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Keep warm features don’t work and butt wording already warn off

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buena y funciona muy bien
reviews.reviewText: Muy buena y funciona muy bien

La verdad la gran decepción. Solo sirvió por poco mas de 1 mes, ya después solo molía el cafe, pero no colaba y luego simplemente dejó de colar la porción completa de agua y cafe que se le pone . Estoy tramitando la devolución
